title: "NBA League Averages Visualizations"
output: 
  flexdashboard::flex_dashboard:
    orientation: rows
    vertical_layout: fill
runtime: shiny
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(shiny)
library(readr)
library(magrittr)

### 身長の表記をcmにする
feet_to_meter = function(Ht = "3-1"){
  res = as.numeric(strsplit(Ht, "-")[[1]]) * c(30.48, 2.54)
  return(sum(res))
}

## 前処理を行う関数
preprocess_nba_league_avg_data = function(dat_avg){
  
  ## ちゃんとデータが取れている年度に限定する
  dat_avg %>% 
    filter(Rk >= 2) %>% 
    filter(Rk <= 44) -> dat_avg
  
  ## シーズン情報
  dat_avg %>% 
    mutate(year = substr(X_Season, start = 1, stop = 4)) %>% 
    mutate(X_Season = as.integer(year)) %>%
    select(-year) -> dat_avg
  
  ## 身長を変換する
  dat_avg %>% 
    mutate(X_Ht = map_dbl(X_Ht, feet_to_meter)) %>% 
    mutate(X_Ht = round(X_Ht, 2)) -> dat_avg
  
  ### Rk(行番号)とX_Lg(リーグ)は除く
  dat_avg %>% 
    select(-Rk, -X_Lg) %>%
    pivot_longer(cols = !X_Season) -> dat_avg_long
  
  return(dat_avg_long)
}


```


NBA-DashBoard {data-icon="fa-globe"}
===============================================

Column {data-width=250 data-height=100 .tabset}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### PER 100 Possessions

```{r}
dat_avg = read_csv("https://gist.githubusercontent.com/gghatano/5a250d08983d38ae34131e8d85524f7f/raw/42c305fb14ea967e556fc98f93f427a2099db3c9/NBA_LEAGUE_AVERAGE_PER_100_POSESSIONS.csv")
dat_avg_long = preprocess_nba_league_avg_data(dat_avg)

unique_name = dat_avg_long$name %>% unique

selectInput("name_per100", label = h4("Please select colname for visualize"), choices = unique_name)

renderPlotly({
  ggplotly(
    ggplot(dat_avg_long %>% filter(name == input$name_per100), aes(x = X_Season, y = value)) +
    geom_line() + geom_point(color = "blue") + 
    theme(plot.margin = margin(2,.8, 2, .8, "cm")) + 
    labs(title= "NBA League Average(Per 100 Possessions)")
  )
})
```
